name: Back View of Dancer and Painter
description: The Love portraits are sculptures of people I love with a passion that is undescribable with words. I wanted to spend time exploring thier bodies, gestures, faces and attitudes and have the sculptural process be a meditation of how these people have shaped me as a person.
